Probelm Statement: Do more recent movies tend to have more genres attached to them versus older movies (pre-1947)? Is there a year in which this became apparent, and are there any kinds of patterns?
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
```
```{r}
db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT *
             FROM info_type
             LIMIT 10;")
db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT * FROM kind_type;")
```
```{r}
db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT *
             FROM movie_info
             WHERE info_type_id = 3
             LIMIT 10;")
```

```{r, results='hide'}
db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT t.id, t.title, t.production_year, mi.info, cn.country_code
             FROM title t
             JOIN movie_info mi ON mi.id = t.id
             JOIN movie_companies mc ON mc.movie_id = mi.id
             JOIN company_name cn ON cn.id = mc.company_id
             WHERE mi.info_type_id = 3 AND t.kind_id = 1
             AND cn.country_code = '[us]'
             AND NOT (t.id IS NULL OR
             t.title IS NULL OR
             t.kind_id IS NULL OR
             t.production_year IS NULL OR
             mi.movie_id IS NULL OR
             mi.info IS NULL OR
             cn.country_code IS NULL)
             ORDER BY t.production_year
             LIMIT 1000;")
#results are hidden from HTML to make the document more readable
```
